Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Whew \Whew\ (hw[=u]), n. & interj. A sound like a half-formed whistle, expressing astonishment, scorn, or dislike. [1913 Webster]
{Whew duck}, the European widgeon. [Prov. Eng.] [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Whew \Whew\, v. i. To whistle with a shrill pipe, like a plover. [Prov. Eng. & Scot.] [1913 Webster]
